// Like run-instrument-2.txt, but now we can step into all three packages.

// cmd: godebug run --instrument bar,baz,foo fooBarBaz.go
// dir: /

-> foo.Foo()
(godebug) step
-> fmt.Println("foo")
(godebug) step
foo
-> bar.Bar()
(godebug) step
-> fmt.Println("bar")
(godebug) step
bar
-> baz.Baz()
(godebug) step
-> fmt.Println("baz")
(godebug) step
baz
